enWisdom: Peace is the fruit of forbearance
Being amicable is the most praiseworthy attribute
Peace is the cause of security and the sign of steadfastness

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَحْسَنَ النَّاسِ عَيْشاً مَنْ حَسُنَ عَيْشُ النَّاسِ فِي عَيْشِهِ
enWisdom: Verily the person with the best lifestyle is one through whose life the lives of others are improved
The beauty of wisdom is kindness and good amicability
The cornerstone of wisdom is being amicable with the people
The symbol of intellect is being affable with the people

Wisdom: كُنْ لَيِّناً مِنْ غَيْرِ ضَعْفٍ شَدِيداً مِنْ غَيْرِ عُنْفٍ
enWisdom: Be soft without being weak and stern without using force

Wisdom: كَمَالُ الْحَزْمِ اسْتِصْلَاحُ الْأَضْدَادِ وَمُدَاجَاةُ الْأَعْدَاءِ
enWisdom: The perfection of judiciousness is seeking to reform [one’s] opponents and being amicable with [one’s] enemies
One who has intelligence is kind [and tolerant]

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُصْلِحْهُ حُسْنُ الْمُدَارَاةِ أَصْلَحَهُ سُوءُ الْمُكَافَاةِ
enWisdom: One who is not improved by the virtue of amicableness becomes improved by the evil of retribution
Being amicable with people is one of the best actions
Being amicable with a fool is one of the most severe difficulties
Fighting while dismounted [in battle] demonstrates the courage of champions

Wisdom: وَجَدْتُ الْمُسَالَمَةَ مَا لَمْ يَكُنْ وَهْنٌ فِي الْإِسْلَامِ أَنْجَعُ مِنَ الْقِتَالِ
enWisdom: I found the reconciliation that does not weaken Islam to be more beneficial than war
